Environmental Impact: Plastic pollution would be greatly reduced, as biodegradable plastic would break down naturally without harming the environment.
Waste Management: The recycling process would be simplified, as biodegradable plastic could be composted and turned into fertilizer.
Cost Reduction: The production and disposal of plastic would become more cost-effective, as biodegradable plastic would be cheaper to produce and easier to dispose of.
New Industries: Biodegradable plastic could be used in new industries, such asics andics, to create new products.
Increased Sustainability: The use of biodegradable plastic would increase sustainability, as it would reduce the amount of plastic waste in landfills and oceans.
